description: "The title cartouche of this early 18th century map of Southeast Asia is decorated with two drawings of battles. On the left, a sea battle with smoke rising from the ships’ cannons. On the right, an army attacks a walled city which is on fire."
title: "D' Indiaanze landschaapen, zeen en eylanden, van Couchin af, tot in de Moluccos, en na by gelegen eylanden / door Antonio Galvaon bestevend ; door Pieter Vander Aa."
